main event: Pinkish bluish reddish clouds in an irregular pattern, reported as a UFO sighting
interesting points: The sighting conformed with the observation of a contrail
The source continually wrote to the Air Force about UFOs and ridiculed the handling of the 'so-called problem'
The sighting of 28 May was similar to many reported observations of aircraft contrails with the sun behind them
Several 'White Sands' sightings had no information developed to indicate anything unusual
The sighting of Miss _____ on 13 April was over Wyoming at 7:35 PM and heading southeast
sighted object: Pinkish bluish reddish clouds in an irregular pattern
